product_name: Bumble and bumbleTravel-Size Thickening + Volumizing Hair Set
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingBumble and bumble's Thickening + Volumizing Hair Set includes three volumizing hair products. Thickening Volume Shampoo uplifts + amplifies while Thickening Volume Conditioner instantly plumps each strand. Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray delivers +40% more volume instantly vs. untreated hair.
details: DetailsBenefitsVolumeLightweightHydratesIdeal for fine to medium hair types seeking lightweight volume and fuller-bodied stylesFormulated without parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oilKey IngredientsFormulated with Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), the shampoo and conditioner add moisture and promotes healthy-looking hair.IncludesThickening Volume Shampoo (2.0 oz)Thickening Volume Conditioner (2.0 oz)Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray (1.5 oz)Item 2632277How To UseThickening Volume Shampoo: Work a dab into wet hair, lather, and rinse. Follow with Thickening Volume Conditioner.Thickening Volume Conditioner: Smoothe through hair. Then leave in for 1--2 minutes. Rinse.Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray: Shake well, hold can 10 inches away from dry hair, and spray in even strokes where you want lift and airy texture.From the Pros: After applying Thickening Volume Shampoo + Conditioner, follow with Thickening Go Big Plumping Treatment or Thickening Full Form Mousse for big, bouncy blow drys. Use a wide-tooth comb to detangle hair and evenly distribute (at the same time).To support texture, try spraying Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray with your head upside down. Want a midday boost? Apply this hair mist at the root and give hair a tousle.IngredientsThickening Volume Shampoo:  Water\Aqua\Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Acetamide MEA, Myristamine Oxide, Magnesium Chloride, Sorbitol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyquaternium-11, Polyquaternium-10, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal.Thickening Volume Conditioner: Water\Aqua\Eau, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Arginine, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Lactic Acid, Lauroyl Lysine, Dicaprylyl Ether, Ethylhexylglycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Polyester-11, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., Vp/Va Copolymer, Zeolite, Silk Powder\Serica\Poudre De Soie, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Glycerin, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Water\Aqua\Eau, Tocopherol, Phenethyl Benzoate, PVP, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Thickening Volume Shampoo: Work a dab into wet hair, lather, and rinse. Follow with Thickening Volume Conditioner.Thickening Volume Conditioner: Smoothe through hair. Then leave in for 1--2 minutes. Rinse.Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray: Shake well, hold can 10 inches away from dry hair, and spray in even strokes where you want lift and airy texture.From the Pros: After applying Thickening Volume Shampoo + Conditioner, follow with Thickening Go Big Plumping Treatment or Thickening Full Form Mousse for big, bouncy blow drys. Use a wide-tooth comb to detangle hair and evenly distribute (at the same time).To support texture, try spraying Thickening Dryspun Texture Spray with your head upside down. Want a midday boost? Apply this hair mist at the root and give hair a tousle.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: I like the product but I noticed with me having short hair if I use the shampoo conditioner and finishing product together it tends to be a little sticky but I still love it

reviews.headline: Love the travel size!
reviews.comments: Since I use the full size of these products in my hair care routine, I love that I can take them with me in a smaller size when I travel. They work great for me and I love being able to use them at home and away.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I love this product. It works well on very thin hair.

reviews.headline: Review
reviews.comments: The only product I wouldn't buy again in this set is the hair spray.  It comes out too fast.
